body_html:
Does your DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH contain a path which has /libcudart.8.0.dylib?

On Tue, Nov 1, 2016 at 12:17 AM, Ohad Levinkron notifications@github.com
wrote:

Good to know.

  1. Make sure you have cuDNN installed.
  2. Try running from python (not ipython). E.g. python -c "import
    tensorflow"

—

body:
Does your DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH contain a path which has /libcudart.8.0.dylib?

On Tue, Nov 1, 2016 at 12:17 AM, Ohad Levinkron notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Good to know.
> 1. Make sure you have cuDNN installed.
> 2. Try running from python (not ipython). E.g. python -c "import
> tensorflow"
>
